content.raw:
TL;DR yep removing it is the way to go we don't use xacro :+1:

Sorry I forgot we had jobs running on this, I had this change as part of a follow-up PR and should have opened it right away :S 
For context: I was planning on parameterizing the entire urdf in a set of xacro files so I had the dependency baked in. As time is running short I figure I won;t have time to do this so I removed it from the package.xml and only later on realized it's in the CMakeLists as well. Actually we dont depend on urdf either at build time because there is nothing to build in that package it's just a runtime dependency. We can totally address this in a follow up PR and merge this now.
Thanks @nuclearsandwich for catching and fixing this!
